CSM Campus, Infocity
Environment Design Challenge
div.p: The CSM Infocity Campus Branding Design Challenge is our first invitation-only competition in which participants are tasked with recommending innovative branding solutions for the exterior, interior and environmental design of the new campus. The modern workplace has evolved a lot over the past few decades, and the introduction of new technologies & the impact of the Coronavirus pandemic is set to change the way we work even more in the future. Work from Home, Hybrid Working and Remote Working is the new normal and CSM is gearing to be prepared for the future workplace. We have a selected jury panel who will be looking for design solutions that use “attention to detail” through branding and interior design as a tool to improve the workers' overall wellness, as well as their productivity.
However, you as a part of CSM have a right to choose your own design for good reasons. Therefore, we need you to VOTE.

p.strong: Please check the proposals submitted and give your opinion about the one you like the most. Because your opinion matters.
